languages.text: "Нет. Дело даже не в том, что я на миссии". {n}Соломон придирчиво осматривает фонтан.{/n} "Это попойка на отсталом мире, сколько бы скоморохов ни воспевало наши имена — нет ни чести, ни удовольствия в том, чтобы пригубить здешнюю выпивку".

"No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Дело даже не в том, что я на миссии". {n}Соломон придирчиво осматривает фонтан.{/n} "Это попойка на отсталом мире, сколько бы скоморохов ни воспевало наши имена — нет ни чести, ни удовольствия в том, чтобы пригубить здешнюю выпивку".

traits.locale_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

"No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

"No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

languages.text: “并非如此，而且这不仅仅是因为我有任务在身。”{n}索罗蒙以批判的目光打量着喷泉。{/n}“哪怕有再多愚人在宫殿里歌颂我们的荣耀，这也不过是落后世界的狂欢罢了。参加这场欢宴既不是什么光荣的事情，也毫无乐趣可言。”
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，而且这不仅仅是因为我有任务在身。”{n}索罗蒙以批判的目光打量着喷泉。{/n}“哪怕有再多愚人在宫殿里歌颂我们的荣耀，这也不过是落后世界的狂欢罢了。参加这场欢宴既不是什么光荣的事情，也毫无乐趣可言。”

languages.text: 「いえ。任務中だからという理由だけではありません」{n}ソロモーンは批判的な目で噴水を見つめた。{/n}「宮廷の道化どもがどれだけ私たちの栄光を讃えていようと、こんなものは後進世界のどんちゃん騒ぎにすぎません。この酒にも、名誉も喜びもありませ」
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ。任務中だからという理由だけではありません」{n}ソロモーンは批判的な目で噴水を見つめた。{/n}「宮廷の道化どもがどれだけ私たちの栄光を讃えていようと、こんなものは後進世界のどんちゃん騒ぎにすぎません」

languages.text: «No. Y no solo porque tenga una misión». {n}Solomorne examina la fuente con ojo crítico.{/n} «Por muchos bufones que canten nuestras alabanzas, esto no deja de ser una simple juerga en un mundo atrasado. Participar del licor local no trae ni honor ni placer alguno».
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: «No. Y no solo porque tenga una misión». {n}Solomorne examina la fuente con ojo crítico.{/n} «Por muchos bufones que canten nuestras alabanzas, esto no deja de ser una simple juerga en un mundo atrasado. Participar del licor local no trae ni honor ni placer alguno».

languages.text: "Hayır. Sadece görevde olduğum için değil." {n}Üsteğmen, çeşmeyi eleştirel bir gözle inceliyor.{/n} "İsterse saray soytarıları sabahlara kadar şarkılar söylesin... Burada olan şey, geri kalmış bir dünyada yapılan âlemden başka bir şey değildir. Buranın içkisini içmek ne onurlu bir şeydir ne de keyifli."
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Sadece görevde olduğum için değil." {n}Üsteğmen, çeşmeyi eleştirel bir gözle inceliyor.{/n} "İsterse saray soytarıları sabahlara kadar şarkılar söylesin... Burada olan şey, geri kalmış bir dünyada yapılan âlemden başka bir şey değildir. Buranın içkisini içmek ne onurlu bir şeydir ne de keyifli."

languages.text: « Non. Et pas uniquement parce que je suis en mission. » {n}Solomorne étudie la fontaine d'un œil critique.{/n} « Qu'importe le nombre de bouffons qui chantent nos louanges, tout ceci n'est qu'une beuverie sur un monde arriéré. Il n'y a ni honneur ni plaisir à ingurgiter l'alcool local. »
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Et pas uniquement parce que je suis en mission. » {n}Solomorne étudie la fontaine d'un œil critique.{/n} « Qu'importe le nombre de bouffons qui chantent nos louanges, tout ceci n'est qu'une beuverie sur un monde arriéré. Il n'y a ni honneur ni plaisir à ingurgiter l'alcool local. »

languages.text: "Nein. Und nicht nur, weil ich auf einer Mission bin." {n}Solomorne mustert den Brunnen mit kritischen Blicken.{/n} "Das ist nicht mehr als eine Zecherei auf einer rückständigen Welt, egal, wie viele Hofnarren unseren Ruhm besingen. Es liegt weder Ehre noch Vergnügen darin, einheimischen Alkohol zu konsumieren."
languages.original_text: "No. And not just because I am on a mission." {n}Solomorne studies the fountain with a critical eye.{/n} "This is nothing more than carousal on a backward world, no matter how many court fools are singing our glories. There is neither honour nor pleasure in partaking of local liquor."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Und nicht nur, weil ich auf einer Mission bin." {n}Solomorne mustert den Brunnen mit kritischen Blicken.{/n} "Das ist nicht mehr als eine Zecherei auf einer rückständigen Welt, egal, wie viele Hofnarren unseren Ruhm besingen. Es liegt weder Ehre noch Vergnügen darin, einheimischen Alkohol zu konsumieren."
